name: Archio XML Organization to GEMMA OAS
description: Maps Organization objects from XML to JSON format

mapping.label: label.#text
mapping.item: {% if item|default %}{% set uniqueItemIdKey = uniqueIdKey ~ '-' ~ attribute(_context['@attributes'], 'identifierRef') ~ label['#text'] %}{% if item.label|default or item['@attributes']|default %}[{{ executeMapping("https://vng.accept.commonground.nu/Mapping-Archio_XML_Organization_to_GEMMA_OAS.json", item|merge({'uniqueIdKey': uniqueItemIdKey}))|json_encode }}]{% else %}{{ executeMapping("https://vng.accept.commonground.nu/Mapping-Archio_XML_Organization_to_GEMMA_OAS.json", {'listInput': item, 'uniqueIdKey': uniqueItemIdKey}, true)|json_encode }}{% endif %}{% else %}[]{% endif %}
